overview:
Laura is a veteran food and wine critic for the Chicago Reader Newspaper and is also the Executive Producer and Food/Wine Critic for â€œTaste,â€ a 30-minute food and wine show on WMAQ, NBC5 Chicago. Following emerging trends in the rich media landscape, Ms. Levy Shatkin brought the Taste library of broadcast quality food and wine segments onto the Internet for on-demand viewing via the creation and launch of WinePeeks.tv. Since WinePeeks.tvâ€™s inception, over three-dozen Internet sites have requested syndication rights and through Brightcove.com, the site is accessible on Yahoo Video and AOL Video. WinePeeks.tv now merges with WineTasteTV, and the two brands move forward as WineTasteTV with Ms. Levy Shatkin bringing her considerable skills to the venture. Laura is a partner in WineTasteTV.

Source: WineTastetv.com
